=== About _HOXChess_ ===

_HOXChess_ is an _open source_ Xiangqi (Chinese Chess) program, capable of acting as a client, a server, or both. The program is a _traditional desktop_ application. It is developed mainly in C++ using wxWidgets library.

=== Key Goals ===

  * Documentation - Providing extensive documentation on how to build and and improve the project.
  * Reusability - Seeking to build the project on top a list of _core_ components that can be used in _other_ projects.
